Package uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection

Provides classes for the underlying connection to a Taverna Server instance.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Connection  
 

Class Summary
AbstractConnection  
ConnectionFactory  
HttpBasicCredentials  
HttpConnection  
HttpDigestCredentials  
HttpsConnection  
UserCredentials  
 

Enum Summary
MimeType Internal mime-type mappings so that we don't pass around bare strings.
 

Exception Summary
AccessForbiddenException This exception is thrown if the server returns a forbidden error code (403).
AttributeNotFoundException This exception is thrown if the server returns a not found error code (404).
AuthenticationFailureException This exception is thrown when there is an internal (HTTP protocol level) problem with authentication.
AuthorizationException This exception is thrown if the server returns an unauthorized error code (401).
InternalServerException This exception is thrown if the server returns an internal error code (50x).
ServerResponseException This is the abstract superclass of all the exceptions generated by server responses.
UnexpectedResponseException This exception is thrown if the server returns an unexpected status code for the operation performed.
 

Package uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection Description

Provides classes for the underlying connection to a Taverna Server instance.

Since:
0.0.5
Author:
Robert Haines
